summary: Utility module that converts Kandinsky 3 UNet checkpoint files into the format expected by the Diffusers library by applying predefined name and shape mappings, loading safetensors, and optionally saving the transformed state dictionary.
business_intent: Allow developers and researchers to reuse existing Kandinsky 3 UNet pretrained weights within the Diffusers ecosystem, simplifying model deployment, fine‑tuning, and integration with other Diffusers pipelines.
